name.th: ปาร์ตี้เน็ตฟลิกซ์

short.ar: شاهد Netflix معًا، ودردش، وشارك الرموز التعبيرية، وأنشئ الحفلات، واستمتع بالمشاهدة المتزامنة مع ملحق Netflix Party.
short.am: Netflixን አንድ ላይ ይመልከቱ፣ ይወያዩ፣ ስሜት ገላጭ ምስሎችን ያጋሩ፣ ፓርቲዎች ይፍጠሩ እና ከNetflix ፓርቲ ቅጥያ ጋር በተመሳሰሉ እይታ ይደሰቱ።
short.bg: Гледайте Netflix заедно, чатете, споделяйте емотикони, създавайте партита и се наслаждавайте на синхронизирано гледане с…
short.bn: একসাথে Netflix দেখুন, চ্যাট করুন, ইমোজি শেয়ার করুন, পার্টি তৈরি করুন এবং Netflix পার্টি এক্সটেনশনের সাথে সিঙ্ক্রোনাইজড ভিউ উপভোগ…
short.ca: Mira Netflix junts, xateja, comparteix emojis, crea festes i gaudeix de la visualització sincronitzada amb l'extensió de festes de…
short.cs: Sledujte Netflix společně, chatujte, sdílejte emotikony, vytvářejte večírky a užívejte si synchronizované sledování s rozšířením…
short.da: Se Netflix sammen, chat, del emojis, lav fester og nyd synkroniseret visning med Netflix Party-udvidelsen.
short.de: Schauen Sie sich gemeinsam Netflix an, chatten Sie, teilen Sie Emojis, erstellen Sie Partys und genießen Sie synchronisiertes…
short.el: Παρακολουθήστε Netflix μαζί, συνομιλήστε, μοιραστείτε emojis, δημιουργήστε πάρτι και απολαύστε συγχρονισμένη προβολή με την…
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Watch Netflix Together, Chat, Share Emojis, Create Parties, And Enjoy Synchronized Viewing With The Netflix Party Extension.
short.es,es_419: Miren Netflix juntos, charlen, compartan emojis, creen grupos y disfruten de la visualización sincronizada con Netflix Party…
short.et: Vaadake koos Netflixi, vestelge, jagage emotikone, looge pidusid ja nautige sünkroonitud vaatamist Netflixi peolaiendiga.
short.fa: Netflix را با هم تماشا کنید، چت کنید، ایموجی ها را به اشتراک بگذارید، مهمانی ایجاد کنید و از تماشای همگام با برنامه افزودنی Netflix…
short.fi: Katso Netflixiä yhdessä, keskustele, jaa hymiöitä, luo bileitä ja nauti synkronoidusta katselusta Netflix-bilelaajennuksen avulla.
short.fil: Manood ng Netflix Sama-sama, Makipag-chat, Magbahagi ng Emojis, Gumawa ng Mga Party, At Mag-enjoy sa Naka-synchronize na Panonood…
short.fr: Regardez Netflix ensemble, discutez, partagez des émojis, créez des fêtes et profitez d'un visionnage synchronisé avec l'extension…
short.gu: Netflix એકસાથે જુઓ, ચેટ કરો, ઇમોજીસ શેર કરો, પાર્ટીઓ બનાવો અને Netflix પાર્ટી એક્સ્ટેંશન સાથે સિંક્રનાઇઝ્ડ જોવાનો આનંદ લો.
short.he: צפה בנטפליקס ביחד, צ'אט, שתף אמוג'ים, צור מסיבות ותיהנה מצפייה מסונכרנת עם תוסף המסיבה של Netflix.
short.hi: नेटफ्लिक्स को एक साथ देखें, चैट करें, इमोजी साझा करें, पार्टियां बनाएं और नेटफ्लिक्स पार्टी एक्सटेंशन के साथ सिंक्रोनाइज़्ड व्यूइंग…
short.hr: Gledajte Netflix zajedno, razgovarajte, dijelite emojije, stvarajte zabave i uživajte u sinkroniziranom gledanju uz dodatak Netflix…
short.hu: Nézze meg együtt a Netflixet, csevegjen, osszon hangulatjeleket, készítsen partikat, és élvezze a szinkronizált megtekintést a…
short.id: Tonton Netflix Bersama, Ngobrol, Bagikan Emoji, Buat Pesta, dan Nikmati Penayangan Tersinkronisasi Dengan Ekstensi Pesta Netflix.

short.ja: Netflix パーティー拡張機能を使用すると、一緒に Netflix を視聴したり、チャットしたり、絵文字を共有したり、パーティーを作成したり、同期視聴を楽しんだりできます。

short.ko: Netflix 파티 확장 프로그램을 사용하여 함께 Netflix를 시청하고, 채팅하고, 이모티콘을 공유하고, 파티를 만들고, 동기화된 시청을 즐기세요.
short.lt: Žiūrėkite „Netflix“ kartu, kalbėkite, dalinkitės jaustukais, kurkite vakarėlius ir mėgaukitės sinchronizuotu žiūrėjimu naudodami…

short.mr: Netflix एकत्र पहा, चॅट करा, इमोजी शेअर करा, पक्ष तयार करा आणि Netflix पार्टी विस्तारासह सिंक्रोनाइझ व्ह्यूचा आनंद घ्या.
short.ms: Tonton Netflix Bersama-sama, Sembang, Kongsi Emoji, Buat Parti dan Nikmati Tontonan Tersegerak Dengan Sambungan Parti Netflix.
short.nl: Kijk samen naar Netflix, chat, deel emoji's, creëer feestjes en geniet van gesynchroniseerd kijken met de Netflix Party-extensie.
short.no: Se Netflix sammen, chat, del emojier, lag fester og nyt synkronisert visning med Netflix Party-utvidelsen.
short.pl: Oglądaj razem Netflix, rozmawiaj, udostępniaj emotikony, twórz imprezy i ciesz się zsynchronizowanym oglądaniem dzięki rozszerzeniu…
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Assista ao Netflix juntos, converse, compartilhe emojis, crie festas e aproveite a visualização sincronizada com a extensão Netflix…
short.ro: Urmărește Netflix împreună, chat, partajează emoji, creează petreceri și bucură-te de vizionare sincronizată cu extensia Netflix…

short.ta: Netflix ஐ ஒன்றாகப் பார்க்கவும், அரட்டையடிக்கவும், எமோஜிகளைப் பகிரவும், பார்ட்டிகளை உருவாக்கவும் மற்றும் Netflix பார்ட்டி…
short.te: Netflix కలిసి చూడండి, చాట్ చేయండి, ఎమోజీలను భాగస్వామ్యం చేయండి, పార్టీలను సృష్టించండి మరియు Netflix పార్టీ పొడిగింపుతో…
short.th: ดู Netflix ด้วยกัน แชท แบ่งปันอิโมจิ สร้างปาร์ตี้ และเพลิดเพลินกับการรับชมแบบซิงโครไนซ์ด้วยส่วนขยายปาร์ตี้ของ Netflix
short.tr: Netflix Parti Uzantısı ile Birlikte Netflix İzleyin, Sohbet Edin, Emojileri Paylaşın, Partiler Oluşturun ve Senkronize İzlemenin…
short.uk: Дивіться Netflix разом, спілкуйтеся в чаті, діліться емодзі, створюйте вечірки та насолоджуйтесь синхронізованим переглядом за…
short.vi: Cùng nhau xem Netflix, trò chuyện, chia sẻ biểu tượng cảm xúc, tạo bữa tiệc và tận hưởng chế độ xem được đồng bộ hóa với tiện ích…
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 一起观看 Netflix、聊天、分享表情符号、创建派对，并通过 Netflix 派对扩展享受同步观看。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Netflix Party: Watch Together, Chat, and Enjoy

Experience the ultimate group streaming with the must-have Chrome web store extension that lets you watch Netflix together with friends and family, no matter where you are. With this extension, you can chat, share emojis, and enjoy synchronized viewing for a truly social streaming experience.

Key Features:

Synchronized Viewing
Netflix Party ensures that everyone in your party is watching the same scene at the same time. Start or join a Netflix party and stream your favorite shows and movies in perfect sync with your friends.

Real-Time Chat
Enhance your watching experience with real-time chat. Share your thoughts, reactions, and jokes as you watch. Our extension chat feature keeps everyone connected and engaged throughout the viewing experience.

Share Emojis
Express yourself with a wide range of emojis in the chat. Add a fun and personal touch to your conversations while watching together.

Easy Party Creation
Creating a Party is simple and quick. Install the Netflix Party extension, open Netflix, and click the extension icon to generate a shareable link. Invite your friends to join, and start streaming together instantly.

Share Party Link
Invite friends and family to join your Party with a single click. Share the party link via email, social media, or messaging apps and start watching together in seconds.

Personalized Viewing
Customize your Party with user-friendly settings. Adjust the chat window, choose your preferred nickname, and enjoy a personalized streaming experience.

Seamless Integration
It integrates seamlessly, providing an uninterrupted and high-quality streaming experience. Watch your favorite content with the added joy of sharing it with others.

How to Use Netflix Party:

1. Install the Extension: Add Netflix Party to your Chrome browser from the Chrome web store.
2. Open Netflix: Log in to your account and start playing a video.
3. Create a Party: Click on the Netflix Party extension icon to generate a party link.
4. Share the Link: Invite friends by sharing the party link via email, social media, or messaging apps.
5. Start Watching: Join the party and enjoy synchronized viewing with real-time chat and emojis.

It is perfect for movie nights, binge-watching sessions, and staying connected with loved ones. Download the Netflix Party extension today and transform your experience into a social event.

Disclaimer: Netflix Party is an unofficial extension and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Netflix. This extension is intended for personal, non-commercial use only. All rights to Netflix and its content belong to their respective owners.
